overview: Year 2040. The US and California are now two different countries. The United States economy has collapsed and poverty has created frequent violence. California on the other hand is a rich and developed country, very attractive to people from the US. A grandfather and his grandson have been victims of organized crime in their hometown and have no other option than to migrate illegally to California, where a better future awaits. This is the story of their journey and all the challenges they have to endure while crossing the border. Will they make it to their dream destination.
title: The Crossing
